text: wala tqwlnn lishay' taezam ealaa faelaha: 'iiniy faeil dhlk alshay' ghdana 'illa 'an tuealliq qawlik bialmashyiati, fataqula: 'in sha' allh. wadhkur rabak eind alnusyan biqawlan: 'in sha' allaha, wakulama nasit fa'adhkur allaha; fa'iina dhikr allah yudhhib alnusyana, waqula: easaa 'an yahdiani rabiy li'aqrab alturuq almusilat 'iilaa alhudaa walrashada
